content: this month for our november crochet along i have designed a traditional ribbed hat using medium weight yarn 4 the 2021 back to basics hat is a gender neutral hat option and it is super cozy to wear this hat pattern has a matching scarf pattern and it is available here https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/2021/11/2021-back-to-basics-scarf-pattern html both projects use a single ball of red heart roll with it tweed and a 5 5 mm i hook this pattern is perfect for crocheters of all levels and the finished hat is a great project for charity and donation centers the hat can be worn as a slouch or as a hat with a rolled brim direct link to pattern https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/2021/11/2021-back-to-basics-hat html > this pattern is available for free on > my blog which is monetized by ads if > you prefer an ad-free version of the > pattern it is available to purchase > right here on ravelry ♥ rhondda **instagram ** https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ **pinterest ** https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ **youtube ** https //www youtube com/c/oombawkadesigncrochet sub_confirmation=1 **facebook ** https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ **newsletter ** https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter #oombawka @oombawkadesigncrochet #odcmakers © 2021 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
